Scottish Championship (Youth Section) 99 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships

Strand on the Green
Callendar College, Falkirk Bands played 'Strand on the Green', plus either 'Round the Clock' or 'Two Guitars'.
